com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces

Interface Connector<T,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The input argument
    S - The output argument

    public interface Connector<T,S>
    This interface connects a type T to a synchronization mechanism S
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S establishConnection(Class key, T t)
      The call of this method, results in the creation of the S parameter, based upon the T parameter Unlike the establishConnection(Object) method, this method will create a new Connection identified with the provided key.
      S establishConnection(T t)
      The call of this method, results in the creation of the S parameter, based upon the T parameter
      default void shutDown()
      This Method may be overridden, to signal the Connector to shutDown any internal components.

    • Method Detail

      • establishConnection

        S establishConnection(T t)
               throws IOException,
                      StartFailedException
        The call of this method, results in the creation of the S parameter, based upon the T parameter
        Parameters:
        t - the creation of the S
        Returns:
        a new instance of S
        Throws:
        IOException - if the Connection, using the factory fails
        StartFailedException - if anything else fails.

      • establishConnection

        S establishConnection(Class key,
                      T t)
               throws IOException,
                      StartFailedException
        The call of this method, results in the creation of the S parameter, based upon the T parameter

        Unlike the establishConnection(Object) method, this method will create a new Connection identified with the provided key.

        Parameters:
        key - the Class, which should identify the newly created Connection
        t - the creation of the S
        Returns:
        a new instance of S
        Throws:
        IOException - if the Connection, using the factory fails
        StartFailedException - if anything else fails.

      • shutDown

        default void shutDown()
               throws IOException
        This Method may be overridden, to signal the Connector to shutDown any internal components.

        By Default, this Method does nothing.

        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong during shutdown
